thread.title: What Boycott? Ivanka Trump Fragrance Hits No. 1 On Amazon
thread.title_full: What Boycott? Ivanka Trump Fragrance Hits No. 1 On Amazon

author: Christine Rousselle
title: What Boycott? Ivanka Trump Fragrance Hits No. 1 On Amazon
text:
What Boycott? Ivanka Trump Fragrance Hits No. 1 On Amazon Share Share Tweet 
After Ivanka Trump's brand was placed on the "Grab Your Wallet" boycott list, several stores have dropped the line, citing poor sales. While Amazon is on the list as well, they certainly aren't seeing any effects of the boycott. In fact, an Ivanka Trump-branded fragrance is the top seller on the entire site in the women's eau de parfum category. 
A majority of the fragrances' negative reviews made reference to President Trump. 
As Katie wrote , considering that Ivanka is by far the most liberal member of the Trump family, this boycott is completely moronic.
